programme.title: Saint-Raphael vs Nantes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Canceled - Chelsea vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.title: Rennes vs Paris Saint-Germain - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Rennes are one of four teams to have beaten Paris SG as many as seven times during the QSI era, alongside Lyon, Monaco and Bayern Munich. However, the Breton club have not won any of their last six Ligue 1 encounters against the Parisians. Rennes have scored at least one goal in each of their last 10 home games against Paris SG in all competitions, netting 13 goals.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: West Ham have won each of their last three home league games against Manchester United, last having a longer run between 1974 and 1977. Manchester United have lost four of their last six Premier League games against West Ham, more than they had in their previous 28.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won their last 19 meetings with Fulham in all competitions, the longest winning run one side has had against another in English football history. Manchester City have won their last 16 Premier League meetings with Fulham, the longest winning run one side has had against another in English league history.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: Brentford vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. Since then, they’re winless in their last eight against the Gunners. Arsenal lost their first Premier League away game 2-0 against Brentford but have since won their last three by an aggregate score of 7-1.

programme.title: Sunderland vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Sunderland are winless in their last 11 Premier League games against Liverpool since a 1-0 home win in March 2012 thanks to a Nicklas Bendtner strike. All three of Liverpool’s Premier League defeats to Sunderland have come away from home, though they’re unbeaten in their last five visits to the Stadium of Light.

programme.title: Sunderland v. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Sunderland are winless in their last 11 Premier League games against Liverpool since a 1-0 home win in March 2012 thanks to a Nicklas Bendtner strike. All three of Liverpool’s Premier League defeats to Sunderland have come away from home, though they’re unbeaten in their last five visits to the Stadium of Light.

programme.title: Brentford v. Arsenal - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. Since then, they’re winless in their last eight against the Gunners. Arsenal lost their first Premier League away game 2-0 against Brentford but have since won their last three by an aggregate score of 7-1.

programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Marseille have not lost any of their last 20 home games against Strasbourg in all competitions, but they have drawn their last three such encounters.

programme.title: Monaco vs Nantes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Nantes are the side Monaco have beaten most often in all competitions under the Dmitri Rybolovlev era. Monaco have not lost any of their last 16 matches against Les Canaris. programme.title: Le Havre vs Toulouse - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Le Havre have lost eight of their 12 matches against Toulouse in the 21st century in all competitions, failing to score on six occasions. programme.title: Montpellier vs Le Mans - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. Ligue 2 is contested by 18 clubs, the league operates on a system of promotion and relegation with both Ligue 1 and the third division Championnat National. The teams play 34 games each, totaling 306 games in the season. The biggest games from each match Day are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 40 - 2026
programme.desc: ONE Fight Night 40 is headlined by a rematch for the ONE Women’s Strawweight Kickboxing World Title as Jackie Buntan defends against Stella Hemetsberger, who previously beat her for Muay Thai gold. Also on the card: Danny Kingad, Adrian Lee, Shozo Isojima, and IBJJF world champions Fabricio Andrey and Joao Mendes.

programme.title: Limoges vs Montpellier - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Camilo UGO CARABELLI (ARG) vs Sebastian BAEZ (ARG) - ATP 250 IEB+ Argentina Open - Buenos Aires 2026
programme.desc: Outdoor clay-court action returns to Buenos Aires from 9–15 February 2026, staged at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club as part of the ATP Tour. The tournament features a 28-player singles main draw and a 16-team doubles draw, with total prize money of US$675,310 and 250 ranking points awarded to the singles champion.

programme.title: Alejandro TABILO (CHI) vs Tomas Martin ETCHEVERRY (ARG) - Day 5 - ATP 250 IEB+ Argentina Open - Buen
programme.desc: Outdoor clay-court action returns to Buenos Aires from 9–15 February 2026, staged at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club as part of the ATP Tour. The tournament features a 28-player singles main draw and a 16-team doubles draw, with total prize money of US$675,310 and 250 ranking points awarded to the singles champion.

programme.title: Cultural Leonesa vs Zaragoza - LaLiga Hypermotion 2025-2026 - Spanish La liga 2
programme.desc: La Liga 2 is the men's second professional association football division of the Spanish football league system. It is contested by 22 teams, with the top two teams plus the winner of a play-off promoted to La Liga and replaced by the three lowest-placed teams in that division.
